category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_org_export
preference.preference_description: Defines the operation type used by the rich client during a "Remote export" operation for Organization objects. The value is to be set by the code, and application users are not to manually change it. Valid Values: * 0: the operation type is set to OBJIO_TC_org_export_reset. This is the default value. * 1: the operation type is set to ALL_ROLES_DEFAULT_GROUP * 2: the operation type is set to ALL_ROLES_ALL_GROUPS * 3: the operation type is set to DEFAULT_GROUP_EXPORT * 4: the operation type is set to CUSTOM_GROUP_EXPORT * 5: the operation type is set to ROLE_IN_GROUP * 6: the operation type is set to SINGLE_ROLE * 7: the operation type is set to PERSON * 8: the operation type is set to OBJIO_RAC_ORG_EXPORT
